testsuite.name: tests.CheckoutOverviewTests
testsuite.system-out: Url is opened : https://www.saucedemo.com/ Entered the username as : standard_user Entered the password as : secret_sauce Clicked on Login Button Verified Loading of Home Page successfully Clicked on product for opening Product description page : Sauce Labs Backpack Verified Loading of Product Desciption Page successfully Add to Cart button is Present Price of the product is > 0 and is valid Clicked on Add to Cart Remove button is Present Navigating to Cart Page Verified Loading of Cart Page successfully Verified Cart Page product Verified Cart Page product price Navigating to Checkout Page Verified Loading of Checkout Page successfully Entered Customer details in the Checkoutpage Clicked on Continue Button Verified Loading of Checkout Overview Page successfully Verified Checkout Overview Page product Verified Checkout Overview Page product price Verified Total Price in Checkout Overview Page Clicked on Finish Button
